values:
just so everyone knows, cole got a badass industrial and its sweet and everyone should let him know just how sweet it is

this last weekend was the best weekend

friday after work i went to a really good party. saturday i had work then prom.  everything about prom was so fun and awesome im so happy i got to go and i had the best time ever.  we went to morton's steak house for dinner and the dance was at promo west.  afterwards we went to afterprom and after that partied at jason's. im glad everything worked out the way it did and after a while of waiting everything came into place.  it was the best of the best: i ate filet mignon, smoked a real cuban cigar, drank lots of beer, hung out with good friends and the girl.  sunday however i was still really sick and elevated when i went into work so that was really miserable.  monday i went to cedar point with mallory, diane and eddie.  also most of our senior class was there which was nice.  i rode most every major roller coaster in the park, even the water ones.  all in all the most fun ever.  im going back to cedar point next wednesday on a physics field trip.

this is so far the most fun time of my existence.

GUERO
this post has nothing to do with anyone else but me because the future is making me freak balls right now

mmmk.
i gotta decide between new york, california, and tennessee.  The three big music states.
im pretty sure im going to nyu but who knows.  Nashville is just as cooking as new york city in terms of the music scene so this is tough.  The only reason i would go to santa clara is mondo scholarshiz, but they dont have the best guitar program, but my grandma lives there and you can see the ocean...mmmmm...
i think i need to experience more of the world before i return to california...the future is freaking me out.  im goin on site visit to the village on april 21...damn manhattan is scary
/GUERO

props to carlo for getting me back into good hip hop.  a huge thank you goes to him for taking the time out of his busy schedule to burn an underground sampler for me.  just like out of the kindness of his heart n shit. really sweet.  not like cool sweet but like sugar sweet ya know?

i cut the arms off of another shirt today.  its getting out of control and if i keep going like this, i wont have any shirts with sleeves left.  somebody needs to sponsor some kind of intervention to help me, cause im a fiend.

generous american beauties press their soft lips to the magnolian charge of the sky

i think that sentence i just wrote is kind of beautiful

i think this sentence isnt so beautiful:

you're making a funny face, fag

leah was sick today and i hope she feels better cause shes a dog.  today in gym, i fucked this kid up in dodgeball, nailed him right in the face...he had to go to the nurse and everthing.  i kind of feel bad about it but when you get down to it thats the nature of sport and we all just gotta deal with the guilt of fucking somebody up every once in a while.  but its just gym anyway.

i pushed my moms car all the way up the hill that is emerald parkway today in the fuckin frozen tundra.  that was rough.  but its all good.


i want to connect with everyone at the same time but its not possible.  there must be some kind of illicit drug i can take that makes this possible for me.

final thought:  it seems like lots of people have been whipping out this move:  "so i was walkin down the street and i saw a dog.  I was surprised because said dog was break dancing."
ya know, like referring to the noun (dog) with "said" in the next sentence?  whatever kind of language fad this is i dunno...i mean i know its not like a fad but ive been seeing it a lot in the youth as of late.  All i can say is that it makes whatever you're saying seem a lot more esoteric and complex, makes you seem smarter than you really are.  okay im changing it to this:  "so i was maxin in my basement and jackie chan busted through the ceiling.  I was upset because AFOREMENTIONED ceiling had just been repainted!" Oh snap, lets see if that catches on bitches.

real world is almost on and im out

hi. i got a funny email today:
Thanks for your e-mail, Paul.  I enjoyed your audition CD very much 
and based on that and your SAT score, you would be accepted to the 
Blair School. The Bach Prelude had a very nice flow to it as did the Carulli, but you might want to check the score on some wrong notes in Lagrima, specifically:
1st measure, 3rd beat, bass with P should be g-sharp not g natural
ditto 3rd measure
7th measure, 3rd beat in upper part should be d sharp not d natural
also at end of the e minor section the g is natural in the chord 
not g sharp so it ends in the minor not major key.
You should hear within a few weeks of your acceptance to Vanderbilt and in the meantime if you have any question, please e-mail 
me.
Prof. John Johns
wow
guess i fucked that shit up! my bad.  in my defense tho, this fucker can be interpreted to have the g sharp and the g natural interchangeable so as to end in major which would follow picardy third protocol.  that sounds like a crock of shit but i swear i didnt make it up.

anyway.vandy woo.deep south.woo?i dunno.but nashville man huge music there i guess.
CARLO GAVE ME A BEAUTIFUL GIFT
thank you so so so so so so so so so so so so so so so so much SO much
he came into my work to give it to me and everything it was totally fucking selfless and sweet hes a dog.  i will repay the favor somehow just let me think of something cute.

thinking of other things that are cute...
when when when will ic er.........................8gan?)*&)(&^

allright
we played norton middle school in the funkiest part of the city on friday..it was so fun but at the same time a strange experience.  It's such a poor part of town.  When we got there the principle told us that a rival gang fight betwixt the two latino gangs in the area was going down and if any white folks interfere there would be trouble.  So once we and danny were done we packed our shit and got the hell outta dodge.  As we were packing our stuff a buncha kids in the lot adjacent to ours were just beating the shit out of eachother it was rough...I think most of the kids liked the show except for this one girl who was like "can i have your autograph? PSYCH!"  hehehe what classic wit! top drawer...we made a bunch a money.  Then that night was the basketball game against westland which is in the same area and the same cops that were chaperoning the dance were there looking after all the westland kids.  bizarre...good thing evan didnt say we were from dublin that woulda been bad.  
Saturday was sweethearts and it was SaWEET.  I had so so so much fun it was rad and extreme and bitchin and so forth.  I love love to dance.  anywaaaaaaaaayyyyy i have work at 5.  happy valentine's day.  maly gave me the sweetest picture in a nice frame an everythin.  woot

sweethearts is this saturday and im super excited
im on the friggen sh court tho erf gak bad
i was sposed to go in and record today but it got canceled for some reason i dont know
im trying to find a new ring tone and heres the issue, i hate the ones you can download that are like clips of real songs they sound so so shistey
im in gym as a senior and its the worst thing in the world
i hope things go sweet on saturday
monday is valentine's day and senior skip day (woo)
we play a dance for a ghetto ass middle school on friday...we'll probobly play back that ass up.
lauren works with me now
it was so so funny though cause on saturday we worked together but like the owner and like 4 other trainees were there too so it was no fun but later itll be better

im stealing carlo's thing:
tell me a memory you have of me cause thats a sweet idea. if you cant remember anything about me then make somepin up

I went to houndog's yesterday to drop of some recording money with josh...and christina was there.
she gave me 
the best
hug
ive ever had.cause like before i got there i was feelin kinda low and tired but then whammo big ol hug. the thing was though i wasnt really expecting it it was like a surprise and i felt sooo good afterwards

i just got back from seeing Hide and Seek with a buncha folks and i was a lil dissapointed cause like it was the same plot almost as secret window or identity..whateva it was fun anyway and i got a spiderman heart pin.

tommorow is late start.right now the rain is freezing.i love cole and leah.i work tommorow but before im sposed to chillax with alexandra havent seen her in a million plus one years.

evan and i bought gta san andreas and we play it every day after school

hopefully lauren gets that job at quizno's that would be cool to work side by side 

i have more on my mind but it can't be spewed here for the sake of discretion
peace nikga

``let the funky music gouge your eyes out``

i had 2 exams, band practice, steak n shake, and work till closing today so im pretty baked right now
but its all good
i take my last exam tommorow and its sposed to be easy 
then me and evan are gonna go back to second spin to pick up some stuff we left there last time

this weather is killer.  i walked outside after work today and because of the snow my car was just bleeding, all my beautiful paint is just melting away

im not quite sure whats gonna happen to me in the next couple days or even to the end of this year
i guess well see how everything goes

lately i've been in the practice and habit of putting things in perspective...i think im stressed or fucked up or whatever then i realize hey hey aint nothin so bad
that's probobly irrelevant to the 2 or 3 people that read this

i'm excited for sweethearts...tommorow if i have time im gonna get my pinstripe three piece tailored and fitted..should be pretty cool

i got squeezed
and the feeling just escapes me

HEY EVERYONE
remember when we had that kickass scavenger hunt?
that was so kickass!
if i remember correctly, everyone had a saweet time and it was lotsa fun
if anyone else would like to do it again let me know and we can
do it up
anyway
i work at quizno's now...i like it a lot
don't ever go to red planet x, tis the devil's thrift
i missed the real world on tuesday which is a first, but man, you know i recorded it man shiiiit
its gone way down hill anyway 
whateva

allright
so we just had a really really awful show just now
it was a fucking greek tragedy thats how bad that show was man like woo
anyway,
despite the awful set we played, we got paid in america
$76 for 25 minutes of fucking up a lot
not bad
so our recording total is like $142 thanks to everyone who went, sorry the show sucked but hopefully you had fun anyway just being together and rocking out...everyone who comes to our shows deserves a fucking medal cause those who support are incredible people.
apologies for tonight but i gaurantee we make it up with a killer cd we be puttin out hopefully with the help of columbus discount records.

bloop bloop

damnit also other things didnt go the right way tonight either but fucking whatever man

allright everyone
the perfect flaw (my band) is playing again at second spin record store on friday the 7th
if you dont have anything to do, go cause it should be a killer time
even if you were at our last two shows (which is a lot of folks)
because we'll be showcasing at least two new bitchin tunes
also another reason to come out and support is that after this show, if enough people go we'll have enough money to record at columbus discount records.  if we make the cash well have it out by the end of january/beginning of february.

other stuff:
lying is bad
dont do it
cause if you do it
your
not
sweet

i was really bummed for an hour today...but then...i was instantaneously relieved

 dammit the nature of this livejournal shit is that anything that pertains to secrecy can not be effectively dealt with.


know what i mean man?

woo this break has been so much fun and want to start off by saying that
CHRIS MANIS is a fucking ROCK STAR he rocked out so hard at Jason's the other day and i just wanna say woo.  good job dude.

anyway it's been straight silly

Jason's party was good...for me anyway not for a lot of people...but the show was one of if not the best we've ever played and it was for the most people we've played for so far so it was just good...and the dancing...mmm...my absolute favorite activity second only to rocking out...

ummm the night after that was new years
I think im making progress actually i know that im making progress actually i know im almost there but not ya know?

the second coming of the conservative ascendency (bummer)
i got a studential cordoba for christmas<--which may forever cement my fate as a classical guitarist jeesh not sure thats where i wanna go but whatever i can hang

OH SHIT i found del's no need for alarm at borders books and i had so much respect for the store until the shadow of realization crept over my mind by way of my peeved-out rapidly firing synapses (such as the throbing metallic pistons of a 38 special) like rising twin moons that the only reason it was there was because i myself ordered that shit several months past

i went to carley's tonight
i don't know why folks go there so much but if i was carley i wouldnt enjoy the boorish intrusion of everyone coming and going such that takes uhhhhhhhhhh place nigga nigga 

i'm reading a fucking tome about che guevara
mmmmmmm tome mmmmmmmm etymology mmmmmmm mrs. vornbrock mmmmmmmm don't touch me there...mmmmmmm extra credit? mmmmmmm okay mmmm....

saw lemony snicket's a series of stuff that was unfortunate n shit
huge fucking dance party on the 30th at Jason's
so far ive gotten into the osu honors program and the university of portland and i got deferred at stanford so i have to wait till april....they essentially gave me a maybe which is sorry shit..whatever i can hang

my future in terms of college seems relatively unimportant right now...cause i've set myself up so that wherever i go i'll be studying music and that's what's up

damnit i miss my old friends
one of the girls last night wanted to do something on campus really bad but she didnt know what and only a few people were 18 so i was like we could go to pochi
hmmm i guess you could call it a waste of...atmosphere?
so yah that was that

what is the fascination with campus? with carley's? steak n shake? with anything that isn't already instantaneously fullfilled by our immediate surroundings?  meditate heavily on this i will........

we don't have any bread
scioto blows

I LOVE ROB SALVATORE AND COLE WILHELMI AND EVAN BABINEAUX

those three guys mean the world to me man im lucky to know them

woooooooo
i was doing inside christmas decorations today
and i placed a stuffed santa doll too close to a string of lights i planned
on untangling later
and this poor santa doll totally caught fire
~my bad~
i leapt into action and diffused flaming cris kringle
to add insult to injury,
later that day
my dog tore his legs off
poor santa it is for you i weep
and tho its true fire is indeed that which enchants my heart the most,
im sorry it led you to your grave

requie dominus ae esforce

so, my mom is half navajo and thanksgiving is kinda tough for her, it bums her out every year.....but....we are making a trip to the national museum of the american indian which is the most recent 'monument' put up in dc.....its a big deal for a lot of people and sort of makes an attempt to fill the wholes of 'voice' that have been gaping `since `long `time...not sure how its gonna be but it looks like a good natured endeavor either way....

i knew a girl two fridays ago
she told me that here, i am
destined to an incredible and undeniably amorous love
i reciprocated vehemently reminding her that i am 
hopelessly riven away from those fairest
every hope inevitably split asunder renders me a big shy pussy

essentiality: bitch you be trippin'''''''''''''''''''''''''''

damn it :?

i bought cake today comfort eagle its magnificent
hung out at carley's tonight it was pretty cool
thanksgiving is not my favorite holiday
so im looking forward for it to be over and christmas time to start

oh no i left my guitar at carley's ! or did i?  i cant rememebr oh damn ill bet i did. 

i put up the christmas lights today they're fucking sweet come by the house and check this shit out, i'm so proud.....the wreath was the most difficult to erect, i devised a system to lift it where i stand on the ladder with a rake which i then use to place the wreath on the nails on the front of the house one at a time.  ingenuity at its finest...i also cussed my mind away as loud as possible...im sure my neighbors (every one of which houses a child age 10 or less) were thrilled about that.

New Stuff:
-football is over.  Four straight years of commitment complete, it's weird but it's time for it to be over.  It's a little sad, but ima have so much more free time to do stuff that I want to focus on.  
-I have senioritis bad, i can't focus on school anymore man its eating me alive.  Somehow my lack of focus hasn't affected my grades, it seems im doing better than ever with the least effort, just more proof that school is fucked up.
-TPF had our first show in ages at jp's halloween party, we sucked so so bad but it was still so much fun cuz i knew everyone there and playing just rocks (we were the village people, i was the cop):D
-Me Rob and Cole are running and lifting on our own, its fun as hell...in a related note i now belong to the rec center so i can go swimming!
-I'm doing college applications right now, big fucking deal.  RElated to that i finally finished my fine arts submission.  It COOKS!
-I went to homecoming a while ago (first dance ever).  had lotsa fun
-By popular culture i am REQUired to purchase both HALO 2 and GTA san andreas, they both look good.
-I FASHIONED MYSELF THE PERFECT FAKE ID!  because DEL THA FUNKEE HOMOSAPIEN is coming on friday and its 18 and over and i have to go see him.  I can now buy cigarrettes, and lottery tickets, maybe porno haven't tried that yet.
-I like someone, maybe ill get to see her this weekend. (I have huge teen angst n shit)

that's all that's going down with me i think
if anyone reads this and wants to talk or hang out or whatever call me:
614.668.4390

lordy

so i was at the krogers on perimeter tonight and on my way home i drove past bw3s and low and behold! the remaining members of the chandler wright story were playing outside on the patio! ah man i got all ferklempt and nostalgic...they broke up when bob (my old guitar teacher) moved to arizona...it was just aaron and zuck but they were still playin all the old stuff...i thought about going in and talking to them but it would be just too weird so i left...i dreamed a lot last night it was like a movie... this is something sweet leah made for me.shes luminous this is me in case you forgot what i look like: and finally heres some pictures of my dog wearing a doorag thats all for now foos

whootregle right now the sky is pinkish

nothing right now is going on haha so i will watch the real world and try on all my pairs of underwear to make sure it all still fits :D thats one of those things you just gotta be sure of

so my grandparents plus their foreign exchange student carmen are visiting...carmen is totlly cool, kind of shy but in her situation i would be so intimidated too...i leave for brown next week and i had to buy some sheets for my dorm room...i bought care bears...i hope my room mate has a sense of humor...
i was on franz road and this teched out mustang was stopped in front of me at a stop light and his license plate cover was a golden dragon wrapped around with red eyes...now...i just bought myself new plate covers and while shopping for some i saw this same dragon one at walmart...i pulled up next to him and was all nice ride and everything and i asked him where he got his badass plate cover...told me he imported it special from hong kong...pash...his license plate was "hurt'n'em"...so point blank im like you got those at walmart didnt you homie? and hes like target actually. thats all


oh yah i was driving with the window rolled down and my hat flew out the window on dublin road...so i almost got hit by many cars but i retrieved it safe and sound

oof fella
so i didnt get to see christian howes tonight because the 501 jazz club is 21 and older...the website says its all ages though...bummer...it was kind of embarrassing and i usually dont get embarrassed but its cool...i enjoyed the company of two lovely souls who made it a cool time...tommorow my grandma/grandpa/foreign exchange student arrive from portland that will be interesting...
o i forgot when i went to buy sod the other day the sod guy called me a cunt..haha
that is all for now
: D

STANDARDS should not be bought or sold!  they are for everyone!  that's why they're called standards!  yes yes i have a real book just like everybody else but i didn't buy it hehm. hrrm hehe hrm.

.so everyone kinda went home early so i decided to do something constructive with my time. story time, bitches. this is the story of phil. phil is an apple. one badass muthafuck of an apple as far as those go. so one hot steamy detroit evening, phil was icing at the felini club. phil was just partying like nobody's business (he likes to blown nose just before shows). just as phil was starting to cut loose, in walks this fine ass hooch just glidin through the club. phil had to introduce himself, and one thing led to another. little did phil know that this dynamo of a lady was the three year fiancee of luitenant rueben, an old acquaintance of phil's from his time in the peace corps. just as the two were finishing up, in walks rueben...damn he was steamin out the ear hole he was so pissed. filled with rage and jealousy, rueben whips out his nine and prepares to ice phil execution style! DAMN! will phil go out like this? like a bitch on his knees? or will phil somehow devise a harrowing escape? find out next time!!!

go to the Newport on Sunday to see commonwealth and the perfect flaw...1245 we had practice today went to the blink concert saw CYPRESS HILL so so good...didnt stay for blink almost every girl there was amazing 12 16 2 you should come visit assorted pictures i was going to put up before but didn't have the time...

likeme

so im hardcore into the dan right now today im looking for a copy of the royal scam...it has more larry carlton studio cuts than gaucho...i really wanna get it...and cd warehouse didnt have it and they usually have some rare type stuff...that's worrisome i'm going to brown this summer (if i get accepted) to take composition, ear training, and MORE theory classes... i have two more weeks with my guitar instructor (who ive been with FOREVER) he's moving to arizona in may...i will miss him practice on friday...im gonna teach jason this simple bossa line(which has exciting improvisational potential)...so looking forward to that... oh yah...i get to get out of school part of the day on friday b/c the jazz band is playing at some elemetary school...i have two solos...eek...yah jazz band is totally hilarious...but at the same time...odius... i absolutely love girl's soccer gross this post was all about music so here's some pictures:

is there gas in the car?
   -yes there's gas in the car...

so i did the trial audition at bowling green today...
...i did not really like the campus...it was all brown...
the audition went well though...the professors were both jazz to the core so they didnt really have any constructive criticism technique wise for my classical selections...EXCEPT...that "my interpretations of the pieces are a little dry"...i played them note perfect but lacked dymanics...it was kind of a waste to go all the way out there just for that but still it was good experience for a real audition...
there was also a theory workshop...blah

and then
i drove home and went to media play and FINALLY bought another copy of one nation under a groove...

...maybe roots + blackalicious free concert at OWU tonight?
call me friends
-capital p

so
after school i hung out with leah (whos a godess) then we met cole (zeus) at steak and shake
we talked about 
stuff
then i went home feeling icky all over

BUT

im going to carmel on friday and WHILE IM THERE im gonna have lunch with my old professor (prof ferguson) from stanford.  The man is a hardcore musical genius and he rides a motorcycle...we're gonna talk about my post high-school options and stuff...

ALSO

tommorow is hardcore tpf practice # 2
new material is written and is about to be set in motion

YEAH

so i set up my dad's old stereo in my room...manufactured 1985 2 years older than me...its big and black and totally boomin
im reading the da vinci code cause chris recommended it to me and it totally rocks thanks so much for the advice 

so my rock opus...im in the middle of writing a tune thats more complex than usual and i hope to play it with tpf next time we practice...i was just practicing it and i totally turned into like this rock demon i was all AHHHA AHHHHH...i also want to take band pictures...good ones...outdoors...actually playing...yah

i returned some hangers to the dry cleaners earlier today and hot dry cleaner girl was there...mm

everyone is back in town...and also...some of my close friends are agitated or something...its none of my business but i hope they're allright

ROCK DEMON: weeeenawowwwwoooiiiii wha ahwwwoo i love the x-files

IGOCARMELGOODFRIDAYCONGRANDMA

-terminate comunique-

so today i volunteered at the american red cross bloodmobile on parkwood for like 4 hours...it was mindnumbing...but i had a book...the da vinci code...everyone says they can't put it down but i'm not far enough into it yet to be like that
so carlo called me and left his numbers for me to call him and like a dolt i accidentally deleted the message
so to carlo: i heart you

today is the day i was supposed to leave for the competition in portland...but i'm not going because dr. keller will fail me in jazz band of all things if i miss the performance that's tommorow. straight up bull shit. anyway...something totally sweet has come along...i'm gonna go see george clinton on march 12...it's gonna be sweet...i've been listening to del the funkee homosapien a lot and he is so close to reproducing parliament's sound...his influence in that regard is blaring...he even sampled the ending gospel hymn "under the sun" that was tagged onto the end of "flashlight" on the dr. funkestein demo 1976...put it in "money for sex" track 6 or 7 on "del the funkee homosapien"...check it out..tell me if anyone has noticed this already or if i am just stating the obvious...i have habitat for humanity tommorow...so since i'm not doing classical stuff anymore i'm concentrating more on modal improvisation...tough stuff...i don't care what you say...you can practice a classical piece till you're blue and play it perfect...but to be able to improvise over changes at the drop of a hat is a feat of a true musician and if you can't do that then you ain't shit. good example: pat metheny...way back last may i went to b&n to get one of his albums but carlo convinced me not to...that was maybe the worst decision of my life and i'll remember it forever...i got larry carlton's new album though...it's clear that his label is totally infringing on his creative output...just listen back a few years to "the gift" or "well done" there's a huge difference in style and freedom... now i have to write an english rough draft on ernest hemingway...i so wish i was writing it on del and parliament parallels... :D

brother...what a funky day...went to take a practice act at thomas worthington...it was canceled because of this big band thing...and it was just me and my graphing calculator in a sea of band people...which was distressing...went to the laptop guy to get my puter fixed...he said it was too old to fix...had to to play with the jazz band again...ick...by the time i got out all my friends were all busy doing stuff already so im by myself but its cool because im taking funny pictures of myself with my digital camera...i will post them cause they're sweet.  the navy keeps calling my house to recruit me and the recruiter guy somehow used his superior intelect on me to get me to meet with at the guidance office on monday...it was like he hypnotized me...but my mind is my own now and i'm not going...besides...sailors have the least fashionable uniforms of all the armed forces...we recorded again yesterday...we were supposed to finish up, but we still have to do evan's vocals on one song cuase he's sick now and his voice is shot...that's all i have to say...
